results.definition: twist together or entwine into a confusing mass
change texture so as to become matted and felt-like
mounting consisting of a border or background for a picture
a foundation (usually on soft ground) consisting of an extended layer of reinforced concrete

examples: a photograph with a matte finish

results.definition: the property of having little or no contrast; lacking highlights or gloss
sports equipment consisting of a piece of thick padding on the floor for gymnastic sports
a mass that is densely tangled or interwoven
examples: a mat of weeds and grass

results.definition: a small pad of material that is used to protect surface from an object placed on it
a thick flat pad used as a floor covering
